attributes.action: lower the smoking age back to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the legal smoking age is now 18 and could possibly be going up to 21 but only a few years ago it was 16, and they had to change it to 18, so i do not see why they changed it to 18 when most people who smoke are under the age of 18, please join if you think it should be lowered back to 16 and deffinatly not put up to 21 
thanks x
